subject: Baseplate
description_text:
Hi
I have ordered ultra pedals from simsonn few weeks ago but I didn't order plate. Looks like is now more expensive than when in bundle. Any chance for some discount ?
Thank you
Tom

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi T B,    Sorry, shipping the baseplate separately costs significantly more than shipping it with pedal. Please let me know your country, and we'll see if we can offer you a more favorable price.

Hi just messaged you on amazon as well. I am from uk . Thank you

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
